2001.name: Spark
2001.effect: Emit sparks of fire and strike at the opponent.

2002.name: Incinerate
2002.effect: Raze opponent with a fire attack. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target with a burn.

2003.name: Flame Charge
2003.effect: Charge at the opponent in a cloak of fire. Successful hit will raise the user's Attack stat.

2004.name: Flame Flicker
2004.effect: Charge at the opponent after cloaking in fire. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target with a burn. The user thaws out if it is frozen.

2005.name: Fire Fang
2005.effect: Bite the opponent with flame-cloaked fangs. This move has a 20% chance to reduce the target's Defense stat and 10% chance to leave a burn.

2006.name: Fiery Claw
2006.effect: Slash the opponent with a blazing claw. This move has a 10% chance of landing a critical hit and 10% chance of leaving the target with a burn.

2007.name: Blaze Punch
2007.effect: Punch the opponent with a flaming first. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target with a burn.

2008.name: Flaming Kick
2008.effect: Launch a flaming kick at the opponent. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target with a burn.

2009.name: Inferno Edge
2009.effect: Focus bitter feelings toward the world of the lviing into a slashing attach. The user's HP is restored by up to half of the damage dealt to the target.

2010.name: Wild Fire
2010.effect: Trap the target inside a wild vortex of fire that inflicts damage for 3-5 turns.

2011.name: Raging Flame
2011.effect: The user ignites itself and charge at the opponent. This move has a 20% chance of leaving the target with a burn but also hurts the user by a third of the damage dealt.

2012.name: Sacred Fire
2012.effect: Raze the opponent with a mystical fire of great intensity. This move has a 50% chance of leaving the target with a burn.

2013.name: Fire Ball
2013.effect: Blast a fire ball at the opponent.

2014.name: Fire Breath
2014.effect: Breathe out a wave of fire at the opponent. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target with a burn.

2015.name: Fire Blast
2015.effect: Release a fiery blast at the opponent. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target with a burn.

2016.name: Heat Wave
2016.effect: Exhale hot breath on the opposing field. This move has a 20% chance of lowering the target(s) Special Defense stat.

2017.name: Flame Burst
2017.effect: Breath out bursting flame at the opponent. This move also deals half of the damage to the opponents next to the target as well.

2018.name: Magma Storm
2018.effect: Trap the opponent inside a maelstrom of fire that inflicts damage for 3-5 turns.

2019.name: Eruption
2019.effect: Release magma blasts into the surrounding area, dealing damage to both foes and allies.

2020.name: Blue Flare
2020.effect: Engulf the opponent in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. This move has a 20% chance of lowering the target's Special Defense stat.

2021.name: Scorching Fire
2021.effect: Use all of the fire power to attack the opponent. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user's Special Attack stat.

2022.name: Blast Burn
2022.effect: Raze the opponent with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. The user can't move on the next turn.

2023.name: Sun Dance
2023.effect: Intensify the sun for 5 turns. The sunlight powers up Fire-type atacks and lowers the power of Water-type attacks.

2024.name: Ignite
2024.effect: Shoot a sinister flame at the target to inflict a burn.

2025.name: Combustion
2025.effect: The user kindle its flames to raise both Special Attack and Special Defense stats.

2026.name: Overheat
2026.effect: The user gathers all the fire power to surpass its own limit. This move drastically raises the user's Special Attack stat but costs half of the user's max HP.

2027.name: Ember Cutter
2027.effect: The user ignites its sharp claws or fangs and slash at the opponent. This move has a 20% chance of lowering the target's Defense stat and 20% chance of leaving the target with a burn.
